column4: I do not have any sounds on 12.04.I can play music,videos etc.But not any kind of notification sound say eg: empathy. I don't have any boot up sounds also.Please help
Help me :(
On 12.04 no sounds. Can play music. BUT no notification sounds like emapthy neighter any bootup sounds
have you checked the setting through Super + Sounds ??
go to Sound Effect tab, check if you have checked the Mute option there
if yes, uncheck it, or maybe the volume is set too low it is unheard
have you checked the setting through Super + Sounds ??
on your keyboard, press Windows button (in Ubuntu we call it Super button), then type "Sounds"
go to Sound Effect tab, and check the alert (notification) setting there, either it is muted or turned to low volume
what's wrong? (be nice here, please.. :) )
you're welcome... so nothing goes wrong now?? ;(
yes, 12.04 comes with default login sound, unfortunately you can't test it there..
i see, try it then.. :)
still doesn't work?
good then
never experienced that before, i just shift+delete all the time :d
seems that it's been disabled by default version after update
a minute, i'm looking for a remedy.. :)
open terminal, type sudo gedit /etc/xdg/autostart/loginsound.desktop
it will open a gedit program, copy paste this: [Desktop Entry]Name=GNOME Login SoundType=ApplicationExec=/usr/bin/canberra-gtk-play --id="desktop-login" --description="GNOME Login sound"
sorry, copy paste this: [Desktop Entry]
after you do, save, and restart, try it, complete guideline http://www.liberiangeek.net/2012/05/enable-gnome-login-sound-in-ubuntu-12-04-precise-pangolin/
you're welcome
